Module sabi
Package sabi

Class DaxBase

java.lang.Object
sabi.DaxBase
public abstract class DaxBase extends Object
DaxBase manages multiple DaxSrc and those DaxConn, and also works as an implementation of 'Dax' interface.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    DaxBase.CommitExceptionOccurs
    An error reason which indicates that a DaxConn of the specified name caused an exception.
    static final record 
    DaxBase.DaxSrcIsNotFound
    An error reason which indicates that a specified DaxSrc instance is not found.
    static final record 
    DaxBase.FailToCastDaxConn
    An error reason which indicates that it is failed to cast type of a DaxConn.
    static final record 
    DaxBase.FailToCommitDaxConn
    An error reason which indicates that some connections failed to commit.
    static final record 
    DaxBase.FailToCreateDaxConn
    An error reason which indicates that it failed to create a new connection to a data source.
    static final record 
    DaxBase.FailToStartUpGlobalDaxSrcs
    An error reason which indicates that some dax sources failed to start up.

  • Constructor Details

    • DaxBase

      public DaxBase()
      The default constructor of this class.

  • Method Details

    • addGlobalDaxSrc

      public static void addGlobalDaxSrc(String name, DaxSrc ds)
      Registers a global DaxSrc with its name to make enable to use DaxSrc in all transactions.
      Parameters:
      name - The name for the argument DaxSrc and also for a DaxConn created by the argument DaxSrc. This name is used to get a DaxConn with getDaxConn(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class<C>) method.
      ds - A DaxSrc object to be registered globally to enable to be used in all transactions.

    • startUpGlobalDaxSrcs

      public static void startUpGlobalDaxSrcs() throws Err
      Forbids adding global dax sources and makes available the registered global dax sources by calling DaxSrc.setUp() method. If even one DaxSrc fail to execute its DaxSrc.setUp() method, this function executes Free methods of all global DaxSrc(s) and throws an Err object.
      Throws:
      Err - If even one DaxSrc failed to execute DaxSrc.setUp() method.

    • shutdownGlobalDaxSrcs

      public static void shutdownGlobalDaxSrcs()
      Terminates all global dax sources and frees resources of all global dax sources.

    • setUpLocalDaxSrc

      public void setUpLocalDaxSrc(String name, DaxSrc ds) throws Err
      Registers a local DaxSrc with a specified name and sets up it.
      Parameters:
      name - The name for the argument DaxSrc and also for a DaxConn created by the argument DaxSrc. This name is used to get a DaxConn with getDaxConn(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class<C>) method.
      ds - A DaxSrc object to be registered locally to enable to be used in only specific transactions.
      Throws:
      Err - If the specified DaxSrc failed to execute DaxSrc.setUp() method.

    • freeLocalDaxSrc

      public void freeLocalDaxSrc(String name)
      Removes a local DaxSrc of the specified name from this DaxBase and frees the resource of it.
      Parameters:
      name - A DaxSrc name.

    • freeAllLocalDaxSrcs

      public void freeAllLocalDaxSrcs()
      Removes all local DaxSrc(s) from this DaxBase and frees the resources of them.

    • getDaxConn

      public <C extends DaxConn> C getDaxConn(String name, Class<C> cls) throws Err
      Gets a DaxConn which is a connection to a data source by specified name. If a DaxConn is found, this method returns it, but not found, this method creates a new one with a local or global DaxSrc with same name. If there are both local and global DaxSrc with same name, the local DaxSrc is used.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of DaxConn or DaxSrc.
      Returns:
      A DaxConn object.
      Throws:
      Err - If the following error occured:
      • DaxBase.DaxSrcIsNotFound - If DaxSrc with the specified name is not found.
